data.name: My Cute Succubus - Artbook
data.detailed_description:
✟My Cute Succubus - Artbook✟- contains art, lines, and early character sketches. Thanks for your support! If you liked the game, you can learn more about what the work on the characters looked like.

♥Features♥:

  • Girls in the highest resolution
  • Lines and early character sketches
  • Our thanks and appreciation to you ♥

♥After purchase♥

After download DLC, you'll find the Artbook in your game's directory folder:
Find My Cute Succubus in your Steam library, right - click it, then click "Properties", select the "Local Files" tab, and click "Browse Local Files"
After that, just open your Artbook folder and enjoy it.
Thanks for your support! ❤️

data.short_description: ✟My Cute Succubus - Artbook✟ - This support pack contains art, lines, and early character sketches.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,28 Ghz or faste
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
Does not contain scenes of violence or sexual acts.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 21.
